full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RJE BLA MA'I RNAL 'BYOR MDOR BSDUS DANG, GSANG BDE 'JIGS GSUM GYI MNGON RTOGS SNYING POR SGRIL BA RE, ,MDO SNGAGS KYI LAM YONGS RDZOGS SHAR SGOM BYAS TSUL, YI DAM CHOS BSRUNG SPYI DANG KHYAD PAR CHOS RGYAL LHA MO LCAM SRING BCAS LA GTOR 'BUL 'PHRIN BCOL DANG BCAS PA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @017A *, ,(CES PA 'DI NI 'JAM MGON BSTAN PA'I GSAL BYED A'A KYA HU THOG THU BLO BZANG 'JAM MGON DBYANGS RGYA MTSOS GR'A SAR SLOB SBYONG BYED SKABS KHA TON TU BYED RGYUD RJE BLA MA'I @017B RNAL 'BYOR MDOR BSDUS DANG, GSANG BDE 'JIGS GSUM GYI MNGON RTOGS SNYING POR SGRIB BA RE, CHOS BSRUNG SPYI DANG KHYAD PAR CHOS RGYAL PHYI SGRUB, ,DMAG ZOR MA, ,LCAM SRING BCAS LA GTOR 'BUL 'PHRIN BCOL RE DANG, LAM YONGS RDZOGS LA SHAR BSGOM BYAS CHOG PA'I SMON TSIG MJUG TU BKRA SHIS RANG BCAS PA 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES BSKUL BA LA BRTEN NAS 'JAM MGON SNYAN RGYUD KYI MAN NGAG 'DZIN PA DGE SLONG @018A *, ,YE SHES RGYAL MTSAN GYIS PHO BRANG CHEN PO PO TA LA'I GZIMS CHUNG BDE BA CAN DU SBYAR BA'O, ,'DIS KYANG RGYAL BA'I BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE PHYOGS THAMS CAD DU 'PHEL ZHING RGYAS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
